column4: Hi! i've install ubuntu 12.04 on my notebook but my touchpad doesn't work, how to repair it??? please help me!
first step: system settings, mouse & touchpad
i check it, but it still doesn't work...
is that the complete screen? i bet you've got sources from old releases
: Yes, when i want to remove burg, this error was shown : http://paste.ubuntu.com/1139440/
what do you get when you type sudo apt-get update? anything different from precise?
: but when i use sudo apt-get upgrade, this error was shown : http://paste.ubuntu.com/1139492/
: I try this but, please see this : http://paste.ubuntu.com/1139497/

i'm sure someone can help better
